Principal Lump Sum Inquiry
PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL
Good morning/afternoon,
Thank you for your e-mail.
Please note that all additional payments are applied towards the principal and shorten the maturity of the contract. Your regular payment amount for future payments will remain the same. Please see below for payment options.
1. Website
By registering on our website, www.myhonda.ca, you will have the option to electronically perform the transaction online under the “Payment Options” tab, and choosing the “Pay Online” option. We will receive the funds within 2-3 business days.
To register on the website, you will require the following information: HFS Account Number, Vehicle Identification Number (VIN), Regular Payment Amount, Postal Code. If you are missing any of this information, please do not hesitate to ask.
2. Online bill payment
You may also contact your bank to see if Honda Financial Services can be set-up as a payee and perform the transaction through your bank. You will require your HFS Account Number to make the payment. We will receive the funds within 2-3 business days.
Should you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reply to this email or contact us at 1-800-387-5399. Our hours of operation are Monday to Friday, 8:00am to 8:00pm EST.
Regards,
Customer Service Honda Financial Services Tel.: 1-800-387-5399 Please visit our owners website at www.myhonda.ca to register and have access to your account online through the My Finance section. __________________________
This transmission (including attachments, if any) is confidential and may be privileged. It is intended only for the person(s) named above.
